actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 242 (relating to deprivation of rights under color of law) of Title 18 of the United States Code to provide that all conduct resulting in deprivation of certain rights shall be punishable under that section.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends provisions setting forth penalties for deprivation of rights under color of law to, among other revisions, encompass conduct where the actor did not know or could not have known that the actions would result in such a deprivation.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 242 (relating to deprivation of rights under color of law) of Title 18 of the United States Code to provide that all conduct resulting in deprivation of certain rights shall be punishable under that section.
